title: Gleamy Watch Face For Moto 360
summary: Watch design with bright background, weather updates and other features.
developerAddress: Office #2, 2nd Floor, 37-A, Civic Centre, Bahria Town, Islamabad
description: Get simply fashionable with Digital Gleamy Free watchface for your android wear. This watch face is designed with a sparkling orange color background, large font time display, weather, wind and humidity.FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.Key custom features:- Digital dials with large font for easy reading Weather update Wind and Humidity update watch and mobile battery update Unique design ultimate readability Clean and simplistic lookThis watch face is carefully designed for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear LiveVisit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.How it works?It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
descriptionHTML:
Get simply fashionable with Digital Gleamy Free watchface for your android wear. This watch face is designed with a sparkling orange color background, large font time display, weather, wind and humidity.

FrillRoid Watch Faces focus in creating professional looking watch faces. Each Watch Face is engineered by high quality design and took enormous time to choose the watch colors with soothing effect which ultimately makes the watch unmatchable and incomparable.

Key custom features:-

 Digital dials with large font for easy reading
 Weather update
 Wind and Humidity update
 watch and mobile battery update
 Unique design ultimate readability
 Clean and simplistic look

This watch face is carefully designed for rectangular and circular smart watches such as the LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, and Samsung Gear Live
Visit our exclusive Watch face collection for Android Wear on our website www.frillroid.com.

How it works?
It’s simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen. Open Settings from Android Wear app to customize the Watch Face. Get this app now and provide us your feedback :)
comments: Crashes too often Great face but i can't customize it without the app crashing
